1_1PAo8TcX1nQGNtFRAKirp1uAoTt3btNdti.body:
No reason to hate humanity. The human brain is an immensely complex thing, containing millions of "wires", and if only a few of them are wrongly connected or faulty, it may lead to bad or questionable decisions being made. That's at least my explanation why some of the bad things happen. In my opinion, there's a good chance that evilness doesn't really exist. 

PS: You can report potentially unwanted zeronet files here, if you want: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/pedoblocker.bit
